messages.subject: Linda Dobson on CNBC Tonight!
messages.msgSnippet: We just received word that HEM s NewsWatch Editor and Early Years columnist, Linda Dobson, will be appearing live on CNBC at 7:30 EST this evening, in a ten
messages.messageBody:
We just received word that HEM's NewsWatch Editor and Early Years
columnist, Linda Dobson, will be appearing live on CNBC at 7:30 EST
this evening, in a ten minute interview with Diane Diamond - talking
about "What is Homeschooling?"

Linda is also the author of several excellent books on homeschooling,
including "The Art of Education," "The Homeschooling Book of
Answers," and the new "Homeschool Success Stories." This should be a
terrific interview!

Please forward this notice to other lists!

Helen
* * * *
Helen Hegener, Managing Editor
Home Education Magazine
HEM-Editor@...
http://www.home-ed-magazine.com
